sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.COA_SEG_NM AS COA_SEG_NM ,A.PRNT_FLEX_VAL_CD AS PRNT_FLEX_VAL_CD ,A.CHILD_FLEX_VAL_CD AS CHILD_FLEX_VAL_CD ,MAX(A.COA_RNG_ATTRB_CD) AS COA_RNG_ATTRB_CD ,MAX(A.COA_START_ACTV_DT) AS COA_START_ACTV_DT ,MAX(A.COA_END_ACTV_DT) AS COA_END_ACTV_DT FROM NFAI0110_01 A WHERE A.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND A.INTERFACE_ID = #interfaceId# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' GROUP BY A.COA_SEG_NM ,A.PRNT_FLEX_VAL_CD ,A.CHILD_FLEX_VAL_CD
